com.vangav.backend.content.checking

Class CassandraCqlVerifierInl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.content.checking.CassandraCqlVerifierInl

  • public class CassandraCqlVerifierInl
extends java.lang.Object
    CassandraCqlVerifierInl has inline static methods for verifying the correctness of Cassandra Cql

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void verifyCaching(java.lang.String cachingType)
      verifyCaching throws an exception if param cachingType is an invalid Cassandra CQL caching type
      static void verifyColumnType(java.lang.String type)
      verifyColumnType throws an exception is param type is an invalid Cassandra CQL column type
      static void verifyName(java.lang.String name)
      verifyName throws an exception if name is: - null - empty - longer than 32 characters - starts with something other than a lower case letter, an upper case letter or an under score - has characters other than lower case letters, upper case letters, underscores and digits
      static void verifyOrderByType(java.lang.String orderByType)
      verifyOrderByType throws an exception if param orderByType is an invalid Cassandra CQL order by type

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
